casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Lewis WRAY, Jr. 382P10-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. John L. Wray, Jr., for Wray, John Lewis, Jr. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of March 2017 by Defendant for Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017." Beasley, J. recused
